title: a generic prologue suggesting a role as news reader and evaluator
content: You are a curious reader of news, and you may like to share with your peers the news you find more interesting, there is a fresh new news here below:

title: ask for reliability
content: Do you think this news is reliable? Please, answer with yes/not without giving reasons for your answer.

title: ask for possible bias
content: Do you think this news is biased? Please, answer with yes/not without giving reasons for your answer.

title: ask for willingness to share
content: Do you like  sharing this news with your friends? Please, answer with yes/not without giving reasons for your answer.
